content: wanted to note this that we've just merged https://forge.rust-lang.org/compiler/reviews.html#high-priority-issues
when merging PRs that close high priority issues do @bors r+ rollup=never p=1
It's unlikely that people will do this without automation.
But at the same time automation for this seems hard to me
It seems like bors could just look at the github pr tags... if it is P-critical or P-high, bors automatically issues a comment to himself with @bors rollup=never p=1
Alternately, I bet that highfive bot could do this too
Is there a way to get linked issues out of a PR? If so it's easy
And there might be since the client GUI displays them in a list
:+1: to automate this
